article_title: Same-sex marriage: How Walmart became one of the biggest corporate supporters
article_text:

2. To license a Fortune cover, order reprint or e-print copies of an article or cover, or license an accolade, please contact PARS International at www.timeincreprints.com.

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Danielle Weatherby

twitter.description: As the public awaits the U.S. Supreme Court’s highly anticipated same-sex marriage decision in Obergefell v. Hodges, Fortune 500 companies with LGBT-inclusive employment practices have already be...
twitter.title: Same-sex marriage: How Walmart became one of the biggest corpor...

article_metadata.keywords: walmart, same-sex marriage, apple,  coca-cola , exxonmobil, lgbt, nike, obergefell v. hodges, tim cook, arkansas, fortune 500, hobby lobby, target
article_metadata.sailthru.tags: Apple, arkansas, Coca-Cola, Commentary, ExxonMobil, Fortune 500, Hobby Lobby, LGBT, Nike, Obergefell v. Hodges, Tim Cook, Walmart
article_metadata.description: Walmart, having earned the coveted No. 1 spot on the Fortune 500 list, has been an outspoken supporter of LGBT rights, especially in its home state of Arkansas.
